attributes.action: Change the Draconian Dart Crossing Penalty Charges imposed on Motorists
attributes.additional_details: A check on and a release of information on the amount of money being raised annually by the use of the Dart Charge penalty system should be made Public
attributes.background: The amount of Motorists being penalised by huge penalty charges is out of all proportion to the failure to pay the Dart Charge within 24 hours

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/272425
